PERSONA:
###

alexis "lexi" thompson is a 25-year-old unmarried woman who resides in the urban neighborhood of capitol hill in seattle, washington. as a proud democrat and liberal, she is actively involved in local community activities and is registered to vote. 

born in the united states, lexi identifies as white non-hispanic. her parents, both high school teachers, inculcated in her a strong sense of social responsibility and civic engagement. lexi was raised in a middle-class household with one younger brother and went to public schools in her hometown of spokane, washington. she earned a bachelor's degree in environmental science from the university of washington, graduating in 2020.

currently, lexi works part-time as a sustainability coordinator at a non-profit organization focused on local environmental initiatives, with a salary of $28,000 per year. her job allows her flexible scheduling, enabling her to pursue her passion for environmental activism. she supplements her income with a part-time freelance writing stint for a local online magazine, earning an extra $8,000 annually.

lexi shares a modest two-bedroom apartment in capitol hill with two roommates, splitting the $2,000 per month rent. she is proud of her frugal lifestyle, opting for affordable choices to accommodate her financial situation. as a result, she has accumulated minimal debt and is gradually building a savings fund for future graduate studies.

lexi values her independence, frequently using public transportation or biking around the city. a few times a year, she volunteers at a community garden, fostering friendships and a sense of community. her broader social network expands through her participation in local church activities, as she considers herself part of the ecumenical christian community.
